## hpr1410 :: Generating Keys on the Command Line

 This is the third in our Security and Privacy series, and explains how you can generate keys on the command line in Linux using GPG.

https://www.gnupg.org/documentation/guides.en.html
https://code.google.com/p/cryptophane/
https://www.tech-faq.com/gnupg-shell.html
https://www.gnupg.org/related_software/gpa/index.en.html
https://utils.kde.org/projects/kgpg/
https://projects.gnome.org/seahorse/
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Creating_GPG_Keys
https://gnupg.org/gph/en/manual.html#INTRO

This article appears on my web site at https://www.zwilnik.com/?page_id=456.
Remember to support free software!
